sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:text.tls:line: So the creations of the poets of old

sense.def: specialist in shi1 poetry; poet

tls:text.tls:line: This is what is meant.

sense.def: This (preceding text) is applicable to the present case/example

tls:text.tls:line: This is what is meant. >

sense.def: This (preceding text) is applicable to the present case/example

tls:text.tls:line: “Take someone, for example, who cheats, deceives, flatters, steals and robs much. (has much wickednes, hypocrisy, villainy CH)

sense.def: deviation; wickedness

seg.line: 真人不敢失神人之辭也。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 真人不敢失神人之辭也。

sense.def: the true man; the man who is true to himself; the man who has realised himself; a person who has truly realised his potential

tls:text.tls:srcline: 真人不敢失神人之辭也。

sense.def: non-referential: divine being; supernaturally endowed person

tls:text.tls:srcline: 真人不敢失神人之辭也。

sense.def: presume; venture, have the audacity to (do something in front of a superior); make bold to; take the liberty of V-ing

tls:text.tls:srcline: 真人不敢失神人之辭也。

sense.def: overlook, fail to notice; fail to use; fail to take proper note of

tls:text.tls:srcline: 真人不敢失神人之辭也。

sense.def: fail to act in accordance with

tls:text.tls:srcline: 真人不敢失神人之辭也。

sense.def: pronouncement; phrasing; text; discourse; rhetoric of speech LH: 出口為言，集札為辭

tls:text.tls:srcline: 真人不敢失神人之辭也。

sense.def: referential: the (above-mentioned) True Man

tls:text.tls:srcline: 真人不敢失神人之辭也。

sense.def: referential: the (contextually determinate) Spiritual Man

seg.line: 乃當使有知自重自惜自愛自治。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 乃當使有知自重自惜自愛自治。

sense.def: and thereupon, and then accordingly; then without delay;Then accordingly (often after a direct speech)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 乃當使有知自重自惜自愛自治。

sense.def: putative: regard oneself as important, attitudinal: treat oneself as important

tls:text.tls:srcline: 乃當使有知自重自惜自愛自治。

sense.def: take sympathetic care for

tls:text.tls:srcline: 乃當使有知自重自惜自愛自治。

sense.def: Foucault: soin de soi> take good care of oneself

sense.def: figurative: govern (oneself) properly
criminal law
man in general; man in the true sense of that word, man who deserves the name of man
"son" of N

tls:text.tls:line: Foolish as I am I don't care.

sense.def: I the stupid one; I the stupid adept

tls:text.tls:line: "Foolish as I am I don't care.

sense.def: not care

tls:text.tls:line: but are not aware of these obvious crimes.

sense.def: evident, obvious

tls:text.tls:line: but are not aware of these obvious crimes.

sense.def: on the contrary, but

tls:text.tls:line: but are not aware of these obvious crimes.

sense.def: figurative: realise, be able to understand what is not immediately visible; see through, recognise the true nature of

tls:text.tls:line: Although you have studied you are not enraged by [the people's] distraction?

sense.def: regard as distressing, embarrassing or dissatisfying; feel and show strong dissatisfaction with

tls:text.tls:line: Although you have studied you are not enraged by [the people's] distraction?"

sense.def: German: "etwa"> marker of rhetorical questions inviting or suggesting/presupposing a negative answer, derived from the meaning "as the only person"

tls:text.tls:line: Although you have studied you are not enraged by [the people's] distraction?"

sense.def: feel offended by; be enraged; take exception to

tls:text.tls:line: They truly come to their end from being without understanding.

sense.def: reach the end of one's lifespan

tls:text.tls:line: They truly come to their end from being without understanding.

sense.def: read zhì: understanding; proper knowledge

tls:text.tls:line: the people in general have been blind until someone has enlightened them.

sense.def: intellectually blind

tls:text.tls:line: the people in general have been blind until someone has enlightened them.

sense.def: be open to an understanding of things.

tls:text.tls:line: the people in general have been blind until someone has enlightened them.

sense.def: Han usage: LH: all (NPs); also: any, as in He Yan on LY 1.2: 上謂凡在己上者

seg.line: 夫俗人懷冤結而死是也。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 夫俗人懷冤結而死是也。
tls:text.tls:line: But we all know that when common people die they are afflicted by resentment.

sense.def: resentment at injustice suffered

tls:text.tls:line: but refuse to instruct others on how to pay attention to preserving virtue

sense.def: with all one's energy, with all one's might

tls:text.tls:line: but refuse to instruct others on how to pay attention to preserving virtue

sense.def: keep in good shape, take good care of; retain carefully, guard

tls:text.tls:line: but refuse to instruct others on how to pay attention to preserving virtue

sense.def: be unwilling to > refuse to V

tls:text.tls:line: This is so

sense.def: that by reason of which something is so: reason, cause

tls:text.tls:line: The culprit is tried in person

sense.def: be accused in court, be tried

tls:text.tls:line: To amass virtue without end

sense.def: very intensely, infinitely much

tls:text.tls:line: is an unforgivable crime.

sense.def: be pardoned

tls:text.tls:line: is an unforgivable crime.

sense.def: be pardoned; be forgiven

tls:text.tls:line: you state what is commonly said.

sense.def: the vulgar; the vulgar people; the common people; the common crowd; les gens du monde

tls:text.tls:line: If this is what you are saying

sense.def: articulate, express; propose; maintain, propose as true; pronounce on, speak up on, speak of (other's bad points); (abstractly) speak of (orally or in writing); inform of; suggest (often formally at court)

tls:text.tls:line: I am not enraged."

sense.def: regard as humiliating, take exception to

tls:text.tls:line: I am not enraged."

sense.def: feel offended by; be enraged; take exception to

tls:text.tls:line: What the situation is they realise only the moment they die.

sense.def: finish dying, having died

tls:text.tls:line: What the situation is they realise only the moment they die.

sense.def: having finished V-ing

tls:text.tls:line: What the situation is they realise only the moment they die.

sense.def: understand things

tls:text.tls:line: Since the division between heaven and earth

sense.def: get split up; get opened

tls:text.tls:line: You do not realise that people in general commit, in fact, six big crimes

sense.def: realise that S

tls:text.tls:line: You do not realise that people in general commit, in fact, six big crimes

sense.def: vulgar person

tls:text.tls:line: You do not realise that people in general commit, in fact, six big crimes

sense.def: guilt; moral fault

sense.def: be accused in court, be tried

tls:text.tls:line: You, Perfected, have studied

sense.def: [you,] a perfected

tls:text.tls:line: "By understanding how to be frightened

sense.def: be frightened

tls:text.tls:line: you have already done away with evil."

sense.def: remove, do away with, get rid of; try to drive away (ants); take off

tls:text.tls:line: you have already done away with evil."

sense.def: one's own bad points; one's own bad image

tls:text.tls:line: We are quite frightened."

sense.def: very much, strongly; also: too much, excessively before VP: very; emphatic after VP: enormously, tremendously

tls:text.tls:line: We are quite frightened."

sense.def: be frightened

tls:text.tls:line: "Yes, we will.

sense.def: express one's officious agreement

sense.def: [you,] a perfected

tls:text.tls:line: You'd better be careful."

sense.def: be careful about (oneself)

tls:text.tls:line: poor people from all directions

sense.def: the poor and destitute

tls:text.tls:line: and together they raise the family fortune.

sense.def: the whole family

tls:text.tls:line: Worthy and unaggressive men who receive my teachings

sense.def: soft-hearted; unaggressive; sensitive

tls:text.tls:line: and they should make an effort to do good. (??恕 is nowhere else in the TPJ. Yu 2001: 213 suggests to read努力for不恕) Sieh mal zu, ob Dir die letzten drei Zeilen hier nicht vielleicht so besser gefallen, und tu selbstredend wie Du willst.

sense.def: moral excellence in action; acts of goodness

tls:text.tls:line: and they should make an effort to do good. (??恕 is nowhere else in the TPJ. Yu 2001: 213 suggests to read努力for不恕) Sieh mal zu, ob Dir die letzten drei Zeilen hier nicht vielleicht so besser gefallen, und tu selbstredend wie Du willst.

sense.def: enact, practice, act out deliberately; act according to deliberately

tls:text.tls:line: do not indulge in following your wishes.

sense.def: cause (oneself) to be unrestrained> give free rein to (oneself)

tls:text.tls:line: do not indulge in following your wishes.

sense.def: be more delightful than

tls:text.tls:line: will achieve what is inauspicious and evil. ( 矣。 子 for 子矣 with Yu 2001:213)

sense.def: daily, every day; day in and day out; progressively generally: all the time

tls:text.tls:line: and keep it in mind.

sense.def: think of; be mindful of; pay attention to

tls:text.tls:line: when heaven and earth bring to life what crawls and walks

sense.def: crawl; crawl about like an insect

tls:text.tls:line: They, therefore, did not dare to make light of themselves and do evil.

sense.def: improper act, fault; wrongdoing; untruth; occasionally: sense for what is wrong

tls:text.tls:line: They, therefore, did not dare to make light of themselves and do evil.

sense.def: allow oneself to be frivolous; be indulgent

tls:text.tls:line: Day and night they did not cease to study with energy

sense.def: during day and night > all day and night

tls:text.tls:line: Day and night they did not cease to study with energy

sense.def: with all one's energy, with all one's might

tls:text.tls:line: and for their part had a clear insight into the commandments of heaven and earth.

sense.def: see clearly, be witness to

seg.line: 不敢自輕易而不力學也。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 不敢自輕易而不力學也。

sense.def: with all one's energy, with all one's might
for a long time, for any length of time; forever; in the long run

tls:text.tls:line: Since earth governs by what is as it is (IS SO OF ITSELF? WAS MEINST DU?

sense.def: NPab[adN] what is so of itself

the right person (for a typically important task or purpose)

six extremes, six poles, six directions

sense.def: wriggle

sense.def: by wriggling along

sense.def: all equally

tls:text.tls:line: The six farmyard animals for instance

sense.def: As for example N

sense.def: the six kinds of domestic animals

sense.def: life

tls:text.tls:line: depend on humans.

sense.def: depend on

tls:text.tls:line: [Their] death and life lie only with humans.

sense.def: only the object

seg.line: 人即是六畜之司命神也

tls:text.tls:srcline: 人即是六畜之司命神也
tls:text.tls:line: So humans are the farmyard animals' Controller of Destiny.

sense.def: be in control over, organise

tls:text.tls:srcline: 人即是六畜之司命神也
tls:text.tls:line: So humans are the farmyard animals' Controller of Destiny.

sense.def: state of being alive, one's aliveness

tls:text.tls:srcline: 人即是六畜之司命神也
tls:text.tls:line: So humans are the farmyard animals' Controller of Destiny.

sense.def: the spirits; the divine creatures; divinity, spirit (typically belonging to or stemming from Heaven)

seg.line: 是萬二千物悉皆受天地統而行

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是萬二千物悉皆受天地統而行
tls:text.tls:line: These twelve [two CH] thousand things develop all under the directorship of heaven and earth.

sense.def: all (of the subjects, or topics)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是萬二千物悉皆受天地統而行
tls:text.tls:line: These twelve thousand things develop all under the directorship of heaven and earth.

sense.def: general control

tls:text.tls:line: heaven's directorship would in part not suffice.

sense.def: then; and so

tls:text.tls:line: heaven's directorship would in part not suffice.

sense.def: deficiency; insufficiency (of resources)

tls:text.tls:line: So heaven would return the thing under its rule,

sense.def: the object(s), this, him; them; the other

tls:text.tls:line: So heaven would return the thing under its rule,

sense.def: get under systematic control, reduce to submission

tls:text.tls:line: and thus place it again in an honoured or lowly position under a chieftain [ Yang Jilin p. 1296: let it have a rank and a chieftain "enter a hierarchical relation and get to have a superior"CH]

sense.def: ruler

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, by means of heaven's Dao you can reign and regulate all.

sense.def: the object(s), this, him; them; the other

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, by means of heaven's Dao you can reign and regulate all.

sense.def: bring under systematic control

tls:text.tls:line: You know, Perfected, don't you?

sense.def: [you,] a perfected

tls:text.tls:line: You know.

sense.def: certainly, definitely

tls:text.tls:line: I beg to ask a question

sense.def: doubtful point

tls:text.tls:line: that is really pretentious.

sense.def: be properly in conformity with polite self-effacing custom

tls:text.tls:line: he would bring everyone under his rule.

sense.def: to make N surrender, get N to surrender or submit

tls:text.tls:line: How can we think of him as being a chieftain under heaven's command?

sense.def: by heavenly appointment

tls:text.tls:line: He is preposterous in bringing people under his rule without any legitimacy

sense.def: unjustly, without legal basis, without moral justification

tls:text.tls:line: He is preposterous in bringing people under his rule without any legitimacy

sense.def: to make N surrender, get N to surrender or submit

tls:text.tls:line: The county head will chase it up without end.

sense.def: continuously, ceaselessly, incessantly; never stopping

tls:text.tls:line: The common people conduct their life relying on the king as chieftain

sense.def: topic marker with a nominalised sentence as a topic

tls:text.tls:line: Is this well understood, Perfected?

sense.def: [you,] a perfected

tls:text.tls:line: and leave the government bewildered.

sense.def: cause to, get (someone) to (do something); send (someone to do somthing)

tls:text.tls:line: He will on his own consider which intentions may not be good.

sense.def: be preoccupied by; linger in thought on; reflect on, be mindful of, think about

tls:text.tls:line: He will on his own consider which intentions may not be good.

sense.def: bad; dishonourable; offensive (words); of bad quality (clothes); malignant (of disease); foul (of smells)

tls:text.tls:line: He will on his own consider which intentions may not be good.

sense.def: opinions 異意 “different opinions"

tls:text.tls:line: Hand my text to a lord of superior virtue.

sense.def: give (something N!) to (somebody N2) (to whom it is NOT necessarily owed but who should naturally have it)

tls:text.tls:line: Hand my text to a lord of superior virtue.

sense.def: of higher quality, of superior quality; best

tls:text.tls:line: Hand my text to a lord of superior virtue.

sense.def: moral potency; commitment to one's natural endowments; cultivation of moral excellence or potency

tls:text.tls:line: Yes.

sense.def: I agree, Yes!

tls:text.tls:line: you shall definitely live long.

sense.def: be about to; shall

tls:text.tls:line: you shall definitely live long.

sense.def: for a long time, for any length of time; forever; in the long run
